DOC.detailed_description: This randomize prospective study involve 100 patient ( male female ) undergo strabismus surgery . All patient randomly assign receive one study drug ( Loteprendol etabonate 0.5 % ( Lotemax ) drop Dexamethasone 0.1 % ( Sterodex ) drop ) undergo strabismus surgery . In addition study drug patient ( group ) receive topical Ofloxacin 0.3 % ( Oflox ) eye drop . All patient undergo complete ophthalmological evaluation surgery include orthoptic assessment strabismus measurement intraocular pressure ( IOP ) . Topical treatment study drug topical Ofloxacin 0.3 % ( Oflox ) eye drop begin even surgery , follow schedule group : 4 time daily first week , 3 time daily second group , twice daily third week , need fourth week . All patient examine 1 day , 1 week , 2 week 4 week surgery mask investigator ( strabismus surgeon ) . The parameter check include : 1 . Patient pain discomfort 2 . Conjunctival chemosis 3 . Conjunctival hyperaemia 4 . Conjunctival discharge 5 . Conjunctival gap 6 . Intraocular pressure ( IOP ) 7 . Number pain control medication take
